data.name: Tsundere Idol - 18+ Content
data.detailed_description:
This DLC requires the game "Tsundere Idol" as it uncensored all dialogue, scenes and character sprites.

By downloading this DLC you confirm you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent) and consent to witnessing sexual content.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC requires the game "Tsundere Idol" as it uncensored all dialogue, scenes and character sprites.

By downloading this DLC you confirm you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent) and consent to witnessing sexual content.
data.short_description: This DLC requires the game "Tsundere Idol" as it uncensors all dialogue, scenes and character sprites.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core m3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires the game "Tsundere Idol" version 1.2+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires the game "Tsundere Idol" version 1.2+

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity, and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- The game contains sexual intercourse involving a virgin female thus some blood is visible in these scenes.
- There is a focus on S&M elements.
- The lead female character will unavoidably become pregnant by the end of the game, and will have intercourse while pregnant.
- Some sexual encounters feature what could be considered 'extreme elements' such as; having public sex, a character urinating in public, body writing, bondage, pet play, recording sexual activities on video, and cosplay sex.
